lyric:
[00:05.320]
[00:11.250]You're just too good to be true
[00:14.040]I can't take my eyes off you
[00:16.370]You feel like heaven to touch
[00:19.030]I wanna hold you so much
[00:22.100]At last love has arrived
[00:24.460]And I thank God I'm alive
[00:27.510]You're just too good to be true
[00:29.880]I can't take my eyes off you
[00:32.480]
[00:32.740]Pardon the way that I stare
[00:35.320]There's nothing else to compare
[00:38.040]The sight of you leaves me weak
[00:40.610]There are no words left to speak
[00:43.670]So darling if you feel like I feel
[00:46.030]Darling let me know if it's real
[00:48.800]You're just too good to be true
[00:51.520]I can't take my eyes off you
[00:54.280]
[01:06.520]I love you baby
[01:10.120]And if it's quite all right
[01:13.130]I need you baby
[01:15.390]To warm a lonely night
[01:18.230]I love you baby
[01:21.830]Trust in me when I say
[01:25.560]
[01:28.240]Oh pretty baby
[01:31.540]Don't bring me down I pray
[01:35.140]Oh pretty baby
[01:37.030]Now that I've found this day
[01:39.990]So let me love you baby
[01:44.510]Let me love you

tlyric:
[by:Yuan丶野幻想]
[00:11.250]你的美如梦如幻
[00:14.040]我的双眼无法从你身上移开
[00:16.370]就像置身于天堂
[00:19.030]我多想紧紧的抱着你
[00:22.100]爱情终于降临了
[00:24.460]感谢上帝我总算活着等到这一天了
[00:27.510]你的美如梦如幻
[00:29.880]我的双眼无法从你身上移开
[00:32.740]请原谅我灼灼的目光
[00:35.320]无与伦比
[00:38.040]你的眼神让我销魂
[00:40.610]无法言表
[00:43.670]所以亲爱的，如果你心有灵犀的话
[00:46.030]亲爱的，让我知道这是真的
[00:48.800]你的美如梦如幻
[00:51.520]我的双眼无法从你身上移开
[01:06.520]宝贝，我爱你
[01:10.120]如果可以的话
[01:13.130]宝贝，我需要你
[01:15.390]来温暖孤寂的夜
[01:18.230]宝贝，我爱你
[01:21.830]相信我说的话
[01:28.240]喔！漂亮宝贝
[01:31.540]我祈祷不要让我伤心欲绝
[01:35.140]喔！漂亮宝贝
[01:37.030]此时此刻我已经找到了你
[01:39.990]宝贝，让我爱你吧
[01:44.510]让我爱你吧
